website_summaries.verdict: Intended to feed 4 or more people, this analog-control air fryer can hold an entire chicken in its basket.
pros: Operations include fry, roast, bake, grill and reheat
Temperature settings range from 180 to 400 degrees Fahrenheit
Indicator lights for heat and power
Includes skewers, toaster rack and recipes
Able to fit a whole chicken in the basket
cons: Controls are analog, so you must guess at temperature setting

customer_reviews.title: This is a good concept, but ... too good to be true.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good concept. But, a good concept will not cook food, especially if it dies after a couple months’ light use. Although I did like the cooking results with this fryer, I am very disappointed with this purchase based on it dying so quickly. I’ll be adding this to the “sounds too good to be true list” of products that I have occasionally had the misfortune to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ben T

customer_reviews.title: Fry you up some taters!
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer does a terrific job of emulating what a real deep fryer does, without the cost and mess of dealing with murderously hot oil. Do items turn out exactly like they would in a deep fryer? No. But if you use it for all of your "frying" you quickly forget the subtle difference between this and "real" deep-fried food. As a bonus, it does do some things a deep fryer cannot, and does others better. For example, it makes shockingly good grilled cheese sandwiches (try doing that in a deep fryer). Additionally it does a wonderful job on certain frozen items such as egg rolls, which turn out better than they do in a traditional deep fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Ike Snopes

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my fryer for 4 months and have only positive things to say...it’s easy to clean, the timer works perfectly and the basket drawer slides just fine. No unpleasant smells come from the unit, it has a fan so it will fill your kitchen with the smell of what your cooking. We love it for fries,fish,chicken and veggies like asparagus and green beans. I look forward to trying new recipes in the future. Don’t believe all of the negative reviews as I’m fairly sure some just don’t know the basics of cooking and don’t yield to the precautions on the instructions. I was not paid to write this review in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Died in under two months!
customer_reviews.text: This unit died in under two months with occasional weekly use. I’m very disappointed. I just spoke with Secura. A manager is supposed to be in contact with me. Let’s see what happens
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick coating comes off after a couple use! :(
customer_reviews.text: Ive had it for like 2weeks. I loved this air fryer BUT..... the non-stick coating is coming off. I never clean with metal scrubbies and wipe out with paper towels. It cooks good great but I hated it to see the non-stick come off
customer_reviews.author: Yumi

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware--Loose Screws--Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this air fryer about 3 months ago and all has been good until this week. My son was eating some french fries and he almost broke a tooth on a screw that fell out of the handle. I have one screw but where the other one is we have no idea, so into the trash this thing goes. Buy a better quality one and if you own this one check the screws that hold the face to the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not made well
customer_reviews.text: The basket release button is made of very cheap plastic. We could not get it to work. We were unable to take the basket out of the pan. Since there was cardboard between the basket and the pan, which we could not remove, we couldn't even use it without removing the basket. We returned it. Next time we will buy local so that we can see the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Um....no
customer_reviews.text: This turned my onion rings into onion things. My chicken wings were soggy. The timer was in 10 minute increments so if you have a dish that you want to leave in for five minutes, that’s your a—. It also had my entire 3,200 square foot house smelling like hot stink once I got through using it. I am only giving two stars because the clean up was super easy. The air fryer I had before needed a great deal of scrubbing but fried foods quicker and crisper than this one. I just don’t get all of the positive reviews. Did I just get a dud?
customer_reviews.author: DBM

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 9 months.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and useful appliance for a short period of time. Used about three times per week. However, after nine months, the device failed to turn on. Disappointingly short usable lifetime for a $100 device. The apparent problem is that the safety switch at the top of the basket opening that prevents the appliance from turning ON if no basket is present has failed and isn't replaceable.
customer_reviews.author: AAGuy

customer_reviews.title: Analog Control Settings
customer_reviews.text: The results I have had thus far with various foods have been good. I also like the size. However, I should have paid more attention to the controls. This air fryer has analog dials. If you have a recipe that calls for a temperature or time that is not already pre-defined, you are guessing. I would like this more if it were digital.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W. Black

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!! Past tense.
customer_reviews.text: Give the secura a try and you will love it. I was leary of it at first. Purchased it Oct. 2018, finally tried it a week ago. I'ved used it every day since. Quick and easy. Update: Ordered last October, didn't start using til a few months ago. Used it once or twice a week. Stopped working while cooking wings. Emailed Secura, waiting to hear back.
customer_reviews.author: San007

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for $58 and I love it. Got it last night and for the first time I cooked 4 chicken thighs and they came out delicious. Taste just like fried chicken. The skin was even crispy. I can't believe I waited so long to pull the trigger on one of these. Just get it trust me. Don't buy anything less than 5qt because they're small. If you look at the pics I posted 4 regular size thighs took all the space in and you can't stack it so get the largest you can specially if you cook for 2 or more people.
customer_reviews.author: Mag DL

customer_reviews.title: Drawer won't close or open!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it because the drawer wouldn't shut! Slamming the item against the wall to get the drawer to seal closed was getting more and more difficult with each use. I had to return the item, which wasn't as easy as it should have been because of the COVID-19 pandemic, the box was already thrown in the dumpster and hauled away. This item isn't a quality product because if you cannot close the drawer, or open it once you do, it's not worth the trouble!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna King

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this Secura air fryer occasionally for 8 months. Results are mixed. There is a lot of trial and error to getting some recipes right. I would prefer more dependable outcomes. I can roast more reliably in my full size convection oven. If I buy another one, it will be a smaller, quieter model with digital controls. Pros * Easy to clean * Allows cooking at a different temp than what I have in my gas oven. Cons * Bulky - Good size for families. Kind of big for two people. * Noisy. Good white noise generator. * Analog controls seem to work ok but are not specific enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: NY Giants Fan from MD

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Bad product.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this a zero I would. Never worked right out of the box. Called customer service for help in troubleshooting and was only told how to return it due to a factory defect. Really?!?! It almost sounded like the rep knew it wasn't going to work and takes calls like this all the time. I usually go with a name I know but took a chance due to the price. Guess you get what you pay for. I'll pay more for a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great fryer
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for a little over a month and really enjoying it. Chicken comes out nice and juicy and steak is tender. still learning the ins and outs, experimenting as I go along. I like that I don't have to slave over a hot stove and cooking for the most part is cut in half. I have the larger machine and it is perfect for just me. Holds 3 full chicken legs with thighs or 4 pieces boneless thighs, 4 small steak strips, 4-5 hamburgers depending on how large you like them.. Was a good buy..
customer_reviews.author: LEW

customer_reviews.title: Who knew fried food could be so easy, NOT messy, and delicious!
customer_reviews.text: My wife really wanted an air fryer and so we decided to try this one. We made fried chicken wings and French fries. It turned out great! The fact that the food for not have to be soaked in grease made eating everything even more delicious. And add the fact that you don't have to deal with a bottle of hot oil and splatter everywhere after that fact was awesome. It is really easy to use too. The recipes in the manual is a nice touch. The machine was a little loud but not unexpected considering there's a fan blowing hot air in it. We really enjoyed using it. We're already planning or next fried dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Hola

customer_reviews.title: A simple easy to use product.
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the ease of use with this product. It is a straight forward appliance. I was looking for an airfryer that did not require the use of digital controls, which are confusing to me to set. Some airfryers will allow only 30 minutes coopk time then you must rest another cycle to finish cooking; this one lets you cook for a full hour if needed. I have cooked french fries to perfection, fried/roasted whole chickens and parts.. I have fried a steak but shpuld have let it cure for two days instead of a few hours. If you are looking for simplicity of use with excellent cooking, i strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gary E. Penley

customer_reviews.title: Nice air fryer but it has a short shelf life
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer was purchased 9/2018 for Christmas 2018.. it was not opened or used until April of 2019 since we ened up buying a home and moving. Its currently march 2020 and it died after a hand full of uses in one year. We may have used it 2 times a month at max. It was easy to use and clean but the last time it was functioning it wouldnt catch the metal pegs for the sensor and the lights wouldnt turn on. Pretty disappointed. I took a risk on buying a not-well-know name brand. You get what you pay for 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: L N F

customer_reviews.title: Great air fryer and a nice big size!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting an air fryer for awhile just never went ahead and bought it. I’m glad that I waited and got this one. It’s big basket allows for many Chicken wings to be cooked but also smaller things like tater tots. The food came out nice and crispy without the need of any additional oils. Very easy to clean and operate. It even has a quick guide printed on the appliance itself for the temp and time for commonly cooked items. I highly recommend this air fryer to anyone looking to get one!
customer_reviews.author: R. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a couple months. It's been reliable, works as advertised, and easy to clean. Like everyone else...you need to experiment with recipes to get proper times and temps...but when you get it right, the food comes out great. I've done drumsticks, wings, chicken breasts wrapped in bacon, zucchini, hot dogs, burgers, and fish. It's also great for heating up sandwiches and wraps...The only con I would point out is the timer knob is round and smooth and if your fingers are wet or oily from preparing food, you can't get a grip to turn it. I would recommend this air fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Will B.

customer_reviews.title: Leary at first
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure what to think about getting an air fryer. I thought the best was to get a regular oil fryer. But my neighbor and a friend of my wife said they liked the ones they had. So we gave this a try. I must admit we have been very pleased so far. I have done some wings, corn dogs, fish sticks, and chicken nuggets. All have come out really well. It is a little loud but at least you know it is done. I am a little concerned with the drawer connection. It popped out the other day while cooking. Will update later if I have issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dakotahjoe

customer_reviews.title: timer quit advancing, but excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: the timer quit counting backwards at about the 2 minute mark. customer service got back to me the same day i contacted them. given a refund and i immediately bought another. i cautiously give it 5 stars, hoping it won't happen again..
customer_reviews.author: jerry haselbarth

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for cooking quick meals, reheating meals or making things you’ve never imagined! My husband likes to put raw in shell eggs in the fryer when making a salad to quickly cook or if he is in a rush and has to run out the door in the morning. I was surprised to see it cooked the eggs perfectly, however this thing makes everything simple, easy and quick. I haven’t used the grill or skewers yet, but I am sure when that time comes, it will blow my mind (in a good way) just like the unit as a whole.
customer_reviews.author: Mz.Evolving

customer_reviews.title: Love Love the Secure Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: Love this Secura Air Fryer so much that I bought one as a Mother's Day gift to My mother-in-love. She loves it too! I love French fries but with my cholesterol numbers, I needed to change my diet. Air Fryer fries taste the same but with fewer calories and less out. Yum! I make everything in it. My kids are laughing because I try new recipes every few days. Thanks Secure! #Southerngirlcookingagain!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Harris

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use for delicious food
customer_reviews.text: I waited 3 months to write a review for this product because I had zero experience with air frying. I love my machine as it makes fantastic spicy green beans with almost no oil. Fried tofu, potatoes, sweet potatoes are tasty and crisp. All of my vegan recipes have adapted easily and did not disappoint. I will not be using it with meat. Reheated restaurant and homemade pizza are perfectly prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Febesmom

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this two months ago and love it. Yesterday as I was washing it I noticed the bottom tray was loose and saw that it’s missing a screw on the right. The left one was loose, but I was able to tighten it. I looked everywhere, but it’s gone. So annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Just Nutz

customer_reviews.title: Needs a few tweaks
customer_reviews.text: The square size of this fryer enables me to put more food into it and spread it out for even cooking. Although I highly recommend there are a few things that the manufacture could improve upon. It seems the fan could be tightened or adjusted so that it is not so loud. Also, the dials that set the time and temperature should at least click into place so that you know exactly what time and temp you are setting. That being said, I am happy I bought it and do not regret the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love our new options for food!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this air fryer. It has transformed the way we cook dinners and snacks in our household. We are eating healthier options as we find new fun things to use it for. It's easy to use and easy to clean. The size is perfect for our family of 3 and I would highly recommend it for larger families also.
customer_reviews.author: Awood

customer_reviews.title: in a word, AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This thing is truly awesome, the food is amazing when cooked with the air fryer. Food comes out crisp, and taste really good. I wish I had bought it a long time ago. In addition to the great flavor and crispy foods it cooks, its easy to clean as well. Easy to clean, cooks well, taste great, and fast. We really like this fryer.
customer_reviews.author: JHenson

customer_reviews.title: Easy operating and cleaning
customer_reviews.text: The reasons I am giving five star are Its larger enough for my family of four Easy to operate We can try new recipies of our own without complicating Cleaning is easy I soak the basket and pan in hot water for sometime before washing Its not too noisy and irritating but its not quiet too Smell depends upon the recipe Have to wait and see how long everything goes smooth
customer_reviews.author: Niralya

customer_reviews.title: This air fryer is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was initially hesitant when my wife mentioned we should get an air fryer. She sold me when she mentioned we would be able to make sweet potato fries. After 6 batches I think I have perfected the process and can say this fryer is great. I’ve also used it to fry zucchini, summer squash, and also make jalapeño poppers. Cleaning is super simple as both removable pieces are dishwasher safe. I’m extremely happy with this purchase! Edit - 22 August 2019 - Air fryer corn on the cob is delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great reputation and comes with all the accessories!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this one over other models because of all the great reviews, price, and that it comes with all the accessories (like the grill rack) that apparently is an additional purchase for the more popular name brand versions. Make sure you follow the instructions and let it heat the first-time use smell away. VERY IMPORTANT!
customer_reviews.author: hawaiist

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic air fryer
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to get an air fryer for awhile. I went with the larger one since I have a big family. We made fries for the first time and they turned out better than I expected. It was easy to clean the unit after, I even had the kids help. I’m so happy I got this fryer and has definitely made cooking healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Air fryer
customer_reviews.text: I love this air fryer. I already owned a smaller one, but it was a different brand. I bought this one because it was larger than most others. I have used it for chicken, pork chops and French fries along with other items. It fries the food perfectly. It came with metal rack and skewers but I haven't had a need for those yet.
customer_reviews.author: suzie

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this unit in October of 2018. I've made all kinds of dishes in it and I love it! Roasting a chicken or making steak tips. It doesn't get any easier it quicker. The food tastes amazing and it's very easy to clean. I work very long hours and this makes coming home to cook so much less intimidating. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Such a versatile kitchen appliance
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas present for my daughter and their family. It was on her wish list. She absolutely loves it and has been using it almost every day since Christmas. she has made so many different things in it that I didn't think were possible and all of them have turned out excellent. She really likes it because it's easy to use, holds enough fir meals for her husband and three young daughters and is easy to clean and maintain.
customer_reviews.author: T. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Oh little air fryer how I love thee. I seriously use this thing all the time. It preheats super fast and the food always turns out awesome. I've cooked all kinds of things in here and they always turn out well. It's super easy to clean and the food is cooked quickly and thoroughly. The basket size is perfect, we are a family of three and it holds plenty. Don't hesitate, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan L.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working already
customer_reviews.text: I bought this air fryer back in July 2018 and it has now stopped working...it was great while it lasted but not expect it to only last a little over 5 months. Very disappointed and will not be ordering from this company again
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: A quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. Fast, pretty even cooking, especially if you use the rack. I use it mostly for chicken, steak and bananas. Also easy to clean because you can put the basket in the dishwasher. Only improvement I can suggest is to give the rack a softer foot so it doesn't scratch the Teflon off of the basket but it appears scientist seem to agree that Teflon is pretty harmless unless you heat it up to a very high temperature. But still, it would be nice to have the peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorCK

customer_reviews.title: Door already broken on it after max 20 uses
customer_reviews.text: Only had it less than a year ... used it maybe once or twice a month ... and now the door has to stay open a little in order for it to work ... when pushed all the way shut it doesnt turn on and wont heat up... only way for it to heat up is to leave it open a crack which scares me kinda... it gets to got to be leaving it open
customer_reviews.author: Tim taylor

customer_reviews.title: i love it , so i bought another one
customer_reviews.text: i had different air fryer from different company which had digital display and buttons, but it just broke. the digital display didn't work suddenly. i also have little smaller size air fryer (i think 4 Quart size) from secura which i bought long time ago. it is still working excellent . it has two knobs instead of digital display. it is simple design and works great. so i bought second one from secura. when i put the basket into machine, it is not buttery smooth, it doesn't give me feel slide-in. but Overall i like it.
customer_reviews.author: jay yo

customer_reviews.title: a little grease to FRY my Chicken
customer_reviews.text: I saw this product on Home Network channel and I told my husband could I PLEASE have this and the next day Amazon had it on my door step, very easy to clean just spray your vegetables and Meats and follow the easy instructions. My fry chicken come out perfect every time hardly NO grease BIG saving there and its HEALTHIER. haven't try any desserts yet. however very satisfy. Thank u
customer_reviews.author: Stan Adams

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean and food tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this air fryer on almost a daily basis to reheat, airfry fish, chicken, etc. to get a crispy finish with only a mist of oil. Healthier, easier, and house smells better as compared to regular air frying. The airfryer has a temperature and time knobs and cooking guide right on the machine. Also comes with a nifty rack to do kabobs. I've used it for a few months now and still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa N

customer_reviews.title: Air fryer worked a total of 1 time
customer_reviews.text: This piece of overpriced plastic worked a total of 1 time! Has never worked again. Only the timer works. Don't buy this one. Keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Anglin

customer_reviews.title: Really nice size
customer_reviews.text: Have only had for a short time but so far, so good. Fixed frozen breaded shrimp and ribeye steaks and both turned out great. The cleanup was terrific!! I couldn't be happier. I do recommend that you read the instructions about removing the basket carefully. It's easy if you know how to do it. I also bought a good air fryer cookbook that helped out a lot in learning how to use it. VERY pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 3 months
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product for like 3 months! And it has just stopped working since! I have tried contacting the company and nothing! Very disappointed! But I will say while it worked it worked perfect and food was great!
customer_reviews.author: SpiritLeadMe

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use or understand
customer_reviews.text: We tried floured/breaded chicken tenders. Did not come out good. Was awful. We also tried French Fries. They also did not come out right. We'll keep using it, however, we'll only be using it very occasionally, so I will update this review as we use it. Good luck everyone else.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalLin

customer_reviews.title: Works great when it decides to work.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself works great when it’s working. Apparently they don’t last long. We had one for under a year and it died. They did give us a replacement but that lasted less than a year also. Good luck if you decide to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy the Great

customer_reviews.title: Great for chicken nuggets
customer_reviews.text: There is not wait time when you use this machine. You will have crisp chicken nuggets and fries in no time. I have only used it with frozen foods, because they get done so fast. It just sits on the counter and is ready for use. Clean up is easy and requires only a minute to do. This machine has helped reduce the amount of oil we use making our food.
customer_reviews.author: Momwith2boys

customer_reviews.title: Best Early Mothers day Gift ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Best Early Mothers day Gift ever!! My hubby bought this gizmo for me! I Love it!! So easy to use and it's a gift that keeps on giving!! No more unhealthy fried foods for us!! Its a must have!! Tytyty!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Montes

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite appliance!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this air fryer! I’ve been wanting one for a long time, and this one works great! I’ve used it three times in three days. The basket is big enough to hold plenty of meat or veggies. It’s my new favorite appliance.
customer_reviews.author: adcoop

customer_reviews.title: Good air fryer and good price.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been very happy with this purchase. Pros: Good price Easy clean Simple and easy to use Cons It’s big. It’s sorta loud I should note it’s neither bigger nor louder any other air fryer if it’s size. These are more category cons than specific ones.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Redding

customer_reviews.title: A must-have kitchen appliance
customer_reviews.text: A co-worker recommended that I purchase a air fryer and I was skeptical at first because I didn't quite understand how it works but I am glad that I bought this air fryer it is easy to use and easier to clean the fries are crispy the tater tots are on point I may never turn my stove on again
customer_reviews.author: Nickey Duh

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until fan stopped working and started to smoke
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed cooking with this air fryer, but within 2 months the fan stopped working, it started smoking, and is no longer useable. The unit will no longer turn on. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: I wish i had bought a different air fryer
customer_reviews.text: The pluses? Nonstick surface makes this super easy to clean. It cooks evenly. The reasons I wish I had bought a different air fryer? The knob for the timer and temp are imprecise. I wish i had gone with something digital. A new drawback that just started, 10 months after purchase, is that the timer stopped working! It is like it gets stuck and keeps cooking and cooking. I now have to set a separate timer! Third drawback is that the basket part and bottom piece do not stay together when you hold it by the handle. The bottom part had fallen off and food has scattered on the floor several times. Frustrating!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kugler

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy with minimal clean-up.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for my daughter, and she loves it. She roasted a whole chicken in it, and loves the convenience of making chicken fingers and fish sticks for her children. She actually was told by a co-worker who had one that he uses his almost every day. Her next effort is with vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: James T. Bayles

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Arrived november 29 2018 and yesterday 02/06/2019 it no longer works. It turns on but about 10 seconds after it starts to hit up it trips the electricity breaker of the house! I used a power surge protected special outlet and indeed it triggers the breaker of that specific outlet about 10 seconds after it starts to hit up. An air fryer is an amazing product, just not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large RECTANGULAR basket is a game changer!!
customer_reviews.text: Great air fryer. Nice sized. Easy to clean. The rack and skewers definitely come in handy. The only slight downside is that it is noticibly much louder than our older model. The upside is that it also holds a great deal more food in the basket than our older model AND it has a square basket Instead of the round one. Makes longer items SO MUCH EASIER to cook. Think fish filets, chicken tenders or corn dogs. Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had no problems with any aspect of using this. I cook very healthy so I love making my kids healthy fries and roasted veggies. I’m not one for greasy food so I can’t comment on that, but chicken wings with rosemary and garlic were delicious and tasted like the ones from my favorite brick oven restaurant. I also make my kids hot dogs or chicken strips from frozen in 5-10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Camellia Willowbottom

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 4 months
customer_reviews.text: The air fryer wasn't built to last, I knew it wouldn't last long, but less than 4 months is all we got out of it. The switch that turns the machine on once the drawer closes, gave out. I really liked having an air fryer, will look into buying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jon C.

customer_reviews.title: Great air fryer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this air fryer! It is easy to use and easy to clean. I have tried many recipes with this since I got it. Fried potatoes, broccoli tots, roasted butternut squash and I can even use it for warming leftovers in a jiffy! The basket is the perfect size and everything comes out delicious.
customer_reviews.author: M. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We have only used this once so far but I loved how easy it was to use, raw chicken wings because crispy like they were fried on 25 minutes - we are trying bacon rolled shrimp tonight for dinner. So many things I want to try
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: So far so great! I am happy to have this baby especially in the hot summer days! Initially, the food tasted slightly different but I would say healthier. Not that it tasted bad. But without the oil it was a new thing for my palette. I have learned how to season and cook so it I now look forward to using this baby over my stove. Sometimes I air fry different foods like I would in the stove. Good amount of space. It's so easy now my 14 yr old daughter makes her own fries and heat up meals.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective.
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived defective. When turned on, the fan inside the unit would bang against the heating coils. Sent back for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Williams

customer_reviews.title: Performs well and easy to clean...
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product. It's non stick material makes it so easy to clean and it's large enough to cook a large amount of food at once. I love the cooking time/temp guide that it comes with as well. My only thing is I wish it had more vegan item guides because cooking meatless frozen goods for example is very different than frozen food with meat inside. A vegetable guide would be a great addition to the guide book too. Other than that such a great product. This was my first air fryer and now I can't imagine my life without one lol!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy L

customer_reviews.title: This machine stopped working soon/Al poco uso la maquina paro de trabajar.
customer_reviews.text: I buy it by Nov 28, 2018 and stop working before a year of used. I remember some previous customers reviews said it stop working really soon, but unfortunately less of one year happened the same to me. The machine did good job, but for that price is not good that soon the machine stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Cajina

customer_reviews.title: Dont think twice
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this so i dont have to fire up the oven everytime for small meals, an i find myself using it for everything, even reheating food. It is a quality product and i love it, i use It daily and so far couldnt be happier
customer_reviews.author: FamBam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but dead after a year :-(
customer_reviews.text: Loved this fryer but it lasted exactly a year. Would have been 5 stars otherwise. Bought it Sept 10, 2018 - died Sept 16, 2019. Bummer....
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Wright

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know I needed one
customer_reviews.text: I never even thought about an air fryer until my oven's computer died and the one I wanted is on back order. I use it daily and things come out much better than a regular oven.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Cody

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient and fast
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised when this machine made jalapeno poppers in 10 mins. Faster than using oven. I had did some in the oven and air fryer at the same time to compare them. And let just say the oven didnt have a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: It works great and has a decent capacity!
customer_reviews.text: This fryer works great! I haven't really tried baking in it yet, although we reheat bread stuff in it and it works great. I threw out my toaster and just use this now for toast. Steaks, chops, chicken, fish, shrimp all turn out great! It Cooks really fast so you need to watch food carefully. The one thing that is a minor problem is that when you close the drawer you have to push it in until it clicks and if you have anything liquid (like eggs) it may spill. Overall we love it! I read many many reviews on many different air fryers and did some serious research and am happy with my final purchase. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Banuchie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent air fryer
customer_reviews.text: There are so many choices out there and some expensive but the Secura brand was recommended to me and I love it. Easy to use and excellent quality. I am so happy that I saved money by buying this excellent one.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great air fryer for a reasonable price. It is very roomy, but I had room on my counter, in a corner, to keep it out. I am still learning how to use it, and it is easy to clean,too. I definitely would recommend this air fryer to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: edna

customer_reviews.title: I have made a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've cooked potatoes, chops, sweet potatoes, whole chicken. What I have cooked better is the fried cheese and the ham croquettes. Really, this air fryer is a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box and starting using it immediately. My daughter started Air Frying everything she could find in the frig and cabinets to try. So far this is great. Would highly recommend to anyone that is looking for one. It is not that expensive and it works great. Happy Air Frying !
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit for 2 people
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit for 2 people. I've made fries & chicken wings in it so far & the Tbs of oil I coated the chicken in was at the bottom of the pan so I doubt much got infused into the meat. Works as advertised but it would have been nice for them to include a larger variety of recipes. It arrived well packaged & on time.
customer_reviews.author: Randye

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this air fryer. Cooks excellent and is super easy to clean up. It's big too so you can cook lots of stuff in it. It's almost as good as a grill and a healthy alternative to deep frying foods.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Atteberry

customer_reviews.title: Warming Up to Air Frying...It is SUPER FAST!
customer_reviews.text: Fryer has a good sized cooking area. It cooks so FAST that one has to watch it closely. Cooks frozen foods straight out of freezer. The dial to turn it on & off looks like a timer, but isn't accurate enough to rely on... Would have preferred a digital timer. But the price on this was good. EASY CLEAN UP!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little too big but easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Size is quiet too big and take quiet much of my kitchen space, i chosed this due to its dual control instead of digital so my parents can use it easily, you just turn to the desired time and tempt then good to go !
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Very excited to use this fryer!
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the size of this fryer and the value for the price! It is pretty easy to use and I'm sure it will quickly become a well used part of my cooking equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Daria Lay

customer_reviews.title: May break...
customer_reviews.text: This is great in the aspect that it does what it’s supposed to, but I fear it will break soon. The pieces do not fit together like gloves and the release button is very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie L Proulx

customer_reviews.title: Time Saving!
customer_reviews.text: My sister has been raving since Christmas. Now I know why! I cut up chicken and vegetables and tossed in light butter infused Mexican spices and 20 minutes later, dinner was served! I may never use the stove top again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great appliance to add to your kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Hesitant about another kitchen appliance but I am very pleased to have purchased this air fryer. The Large capacity is great for wings, fries and chicken. If you have a family of more than 4 you’d need to cook in batches but that’s the case for all air dryers I’d think. We have loved everything made in it so far.
customer_reviews.author: bird lady

customer_reviews.title: The Best!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had a smaller air fryer and once she fixed a few dishes solely in the air fryer, I had to have one. Don’t ever use my oven anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Serendipity

customer_reviews.title: Arrived right on time
customer_reviews.text: Air Fryer works great! makes everything crisp - great for leftovers that get mushy in the microwave. Great for making chicken fingers from scratch and frozen fries and onion rings are quick and awesome.
customer_reviews.author: mom2boys2002

customer_reviews.title: 3 reasons not to buy it.
customer_reviews.text: 1.The basket does not slide in easily. You have to really slam it in or it pops out. I think this is a defect. 2. The timer dial is really chunky. It is hard to tell exactly how many minutes you have selected. 3. The first time use smell was horrible. It smelled like plastic melting.
customer_reviews.author: Giant Dad

customer_reviews.title: Crispy food and Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 and gave 2 as gifts. You’ll never want to eat bacon made any other way. Not too greasy and very crispy. For Steak house baked potatoes, rub olive oil mixed with Montreal Steak seasoning with a little sea salt and bake for 50 minutes on high. They come out crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. Yummy. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Czekalski

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, convenient and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it many times but I love how you get yummy food without the unnecessary fat. The food is made easy, fast and without leaving all the house with a greasy smell. I love it brings the little skewers and kebab's rack, the taste was great! I have not mastered the perfect "fried look and taste" yet as the appliance is new but next time I'll try maximum temperature and spraying a little olive oil to see how it goes! Very excited about this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susana

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Have tried a couple of recipes from the book. Fried chicken and small pork roast were good. The book doesn't have very many recipes but online you can find more. We had coconut shrimp [very good] and I think tator tots are everybody's favorite.
customer_reviews.author: History Reader

customer_reviews.title: Heating Coil Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product! It was a great addition to our kitchen. I have had it just over a year now. Just today the heating coil went out. The fan works and the timer but it does not produce any heat to cook the food.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: COOKS BEST FRIEND
customer_reviews.text: This product is a cooks 'best friend". The square configuration rather than the round ones sold by the other companies gives you the option to cook more at one time. Makes it nice to reheat leftovers. The ease in cleaning the unit is wonderful too. I like it so well that I will be ordering another unit for our vacation home - rather than taking it from home to vacation home. My sister turned me on to your brand of air fryer. Great referral. Grandson loves the chicken tenders!
customer_reviews.author: Neighbors

customer_reviews.title: Best. Kitchen. Addition.
customer_reviews.text: Great appliance to add to our two person household. We are eating healthier and the kitchen stays cool! Aesthetically pleasing as well since we keep it out on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: MARLEE

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy
customer_reviews.text: I don't write many reviews, and I don't have much experience with air fryers, but we have used this EVERY day since we received it. Fish, pork, steak, wings, vegetables.... this has made cooking much easier for us. My wife ordered a smaller version for her work as you just pop stuff in there and wait.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't dry out frozen foods
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use when my grandkids are here, but has turned out to be very useful. The frozen foods do not get dried out like they seem to get in the oven. We even fixed hot dogs in it. Would recommend the large size if you have a family.
customer_reviews.author: Ghee

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this fryer because of its size.
customer_reviews.text: I don't use my oven any more.. Everything goes into the airfryer, including personal size pizza. Clean-up is a breeze, no splatter. I love it. The only thing negative I have to say about it is the accompanying cookbook. I was afraid to use it in the beginning because the cookbook was so small I felt limited in what I could make. I would have liked a more comprehensive cookbook giving times for different foods.
customer_reviews.author: judio

customer_reviews.title: Only worked 2 times
customer_reviews.text: Only used 2 times worked great . I got it out to use this weekend and would not work very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: ango

customer_reviews.title: Air fryer
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life I love it so much everything comes out so good and moist so far and so easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L. Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Great appliance but should last longer than a year.
customer_reviews.text: I've had my airfryer for over a year but it has stopped working. A wonderful appliance but I'm hoping the 2 year warranty will stand behind what ever is wrong. After contacting secura, they are replacing my appliance. Very happy with customer service. Hoping my new airfryer last longer cause it really is a good device.
customer_reviews.author: bev

customer_reviews.title: Best air fryer for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have two other small air fryers that i got from hsn and i thought there where great until i got this one its bigger it cooks muck better a it looks great so far I'll have only made grilled cheese and chicken wings in it but both came out perfect
customer_reviews.author: Kalliya Marshall

product_meta.title: Secura Air Fryer XL 5.3 Quart 1700-Watt Electric Hot Air Fryers Oven Oil Free Nonstick Cooker w/Additional Accessories, Recipes, BBQ Rack & Skewers for Frying, Roasting, Grilling, Baking (Silver)
feature_bullets: Healthy & flavorful cooking for your entire family - 1700W power air fryer basket holds up to 5. 3 quarts (5. 0 liters) (one of the largest fryers on the market)
All-in-one convenience cooker - use it daily to fry, roast, bake, reheat or grill - it does it all and heats up in 3 minutes
Faster, more energy efficient, & less mess - convection technology uses rapidly circulating heated air for fast and even frying with little to no oil

User-friendly, easy-to-read, adjustable controls - temperature settings from 180° to 400° for a wide variety of recipes | 60-minute timer with auto-shut off alerts you when food is done | power and heat indicator lights
Bonus accessories - grilling rack and skewers for additional versatility and a collection of delicious air fryer recipes to get you started

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,487 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
